title: Next-Door Incubus
description: An irresistible sex demon is haunting my dreams. Worst part is… he’s my new neighbor.Dani never expects to meet her hot new neighbor, Eros, for the first time wearing only her underwear. And she definitely never expects for him to show up in her dreams as a demon with large, curved horns and an insatiable hunger for her.For her own sanity, Dani’s determined to avoid Eros at all costs.But she can’t seem to stay away from him. He’s haunting her nights with his devilish black eyes and he’s hiding a dangerous secret that may cost Dani her life.
author: Emilia  Rose
